action.message: **** First trial since experiment load - initializing

task_system._error: Task Systems must contain >=1 transition that yields to parent

action.message: tTrialStartMWTimestampMs is too large - should happen only after several days of running!?
stim odds must sum to 80! (sum now is $tTempStimOdds )
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When doBlock2 and !doBlock2SeparateOdds, all odds must be div. by 2
When using trialLaser, doLaserStim must be off
When doLaserStim, ramp or train must be set
For constant trial laser, set on and off time to 0. Otherwise on/off time must both be set
In ITI, waiting for $tItiWaitTimeMs ms, then waiting for press

transition.tag: If Lever Down, Go To TrialStimOn
If fakeMouse elapsed, go to TrialStimOn
If waiting here too long (120s), go to TrialStimOn

action.message: fake mouse to react in $tFakeMouseReactMs ms
LeverDown (need to hold for $tTotalReqHoldTimeMs + tooFastTime ms)

transition.tag: If Lever Up, Go To EarlyRelease
If fakeMouseTimer expired, go to EarlyRelease
If leverHoldTimer Expired, Go To StimOn
If Lever Up, Go To EarlyRelease
If Fake mouse timer expired, Go To EarlyRelease
if tooFastTimer expired, go to React
if rewards remain, go to SingleReward (note must be -1)
If interRewardIntervalTimer expired, go to GiveReward
- bypass timer checking if no timeout requested
